definition: Octopus card (Hong Kong smart card for electronic payments)
eight/8
surname Da
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Please select the BEA Branch from which you would like to collect all your Personalised Octopus cards.
sentences.chinese: 请选择领取所有个人八达通卡之东亚银行分行。

sentences.english: With more popular use of credit cards and Octopus cards, do you bring less cash when going out?
sentences.chinese: 八达通及信用卡的普遍会否令你带少了现金上街？

sentences.english: How frequent do you usually use Octopus Card for paying local travelling expenses?
sentences.chinese: 你大约多久会使用八达通去付车费最少一次？

sentences.english: Which OCL's product do you prefer?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢下列哪一种的八达通产品？

sentences.english: Which of the following categories of Octopus Card do you use?
sentences.chinese: 你现时使用的是下列哪一种类型的八达通呢？

sentences.english: What method do you often use to add value for your Octopus cards?
sentences.chinese: 请问你多数使用哪种八达通增值方法？

sentences.english: How frequent do you use Octopus Card?
sentences.chinese: 你大约多久日会使用八达通最少一次？

sentences.english: Do you think that the information on OCL's official web site is informative or not?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得登录在八达通公司网站的资料是否有价值？

sentences.english: What is your type of Octopus cards, namely the ordinary one or the personal one?
sentences.chinese: 请问你的八达通卡是个人还是普通的？

sentences.english: Excuse me, is there any ticket or card like Octopus in Hong Kong?
sentences.chinese: 请问这里有像香港八达通之类的储值卡吗？

sentences.english: Have you ever accessed OCL's official web site?
sentences.chinese: 你有否曾进入八达通公司的网站？

sentences.english: The company has launched its own inquiry on how it handles personal data.
sentences.chinese: 八达通已经就如何处理个人资料发起了自己的调查。

sentences.english: How frequent do you use Octopus Card for making payments in retail shops?
sentences.chinese: 你大约多久会使用八达通去付款购物最少一次？

sentences.english: Have you ever read Octopus Card's personal data policy?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾经阅读八达通公司的个人资料声明？

sentences.english: What do you think when Octopus cards plus credit cards add-valued service?
sentences.chinese: 你对八达通和信用卡二合一有什么意见？

sentences.english: P: Excuse me, is there any ticket or card like Octopus in Hong Kong?
sentences.chinese: 请问这里有像香港八达通之类的储值卡吗？

definition: EasyCard, smartcard used for payment on public transport and at other businesses such as convenience stores in Taipei and surrounding areas
public transportation card/prepaid transit card/subway pass
(Hong Kong) MTR (Mass Transit Railway)
to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
rapid transit/subway
stored-value card/prepaid card (telephone, transport etc)
Alipay, online payment platform
Lok Ma Chau (place in Hong Kong)
Hong Kong currency/Hong Kong dollar
Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents/Taiwan Compatriot Entry Permit/abbr. for 台灣居民來往大陸通行證|台湾居民来往大陆通行证[Tai2 wan1 Ju1 min2 Lai2 wang3 Da4 lu4 Tong1 xing2 zheng4]
Tsim Sha Tsui, urbanized area in Hong Kong
Yikatong (Beijing public transport smart card)
Causeway Bay
Hong Kong LRT (Light Rail Transit) (abbr. for 輕便鐵路|轻便铁路)
Mong Kok (area in Hong Kong)
(dialect) to give change
